Name: Arid Tag
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Bonsly and Sudowoodo.  Swap a Bonsly Dew and a Bonsly Card for an Arid Tag at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
